com.xdays.game

Class CardGameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xdays.game.CardGameManager

  • public class CardGameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    CardGameManager.java - Manages each card game, i.e. plays the players cards and then makes the ai to play.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Damian Hobeanu, Mark Ebel, Roberto Lovece, Ronil Goldenwalla, Hugh Williams

    • Constructor Summary

      CardGameManager(int emissionsValue, User givenUser, int level, CardCollection collection)
      Creates the the decks for both player and ai as well as the board for each side

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardGameManager

        public CardGameManager(int emissionsValue,
                       User givenUser,
                       int level,
                       CardCollection collection)
        Creates the the decks for both player and ai as well as the board for each side
        Parameters:
        emissionsValue - start value of the emissions bar
        givenUser - the player playing the game
        level - current level of the game
        collection - collection of all the cards in the game

    • Method Detail

      • createEnemyAi

        public void createEnemyAi(int level)
        Gives the ai a different deck depending on the level
        Parameters:
        level - current level used to determine which deck to select

      • playCardGameRound

        public void playCardGameRound(Card card,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Card> chosenCards)
        plays a card game round for either the player of the ai depending on isPlayerTurn
        Parameters:
        card - the card you want to play
        chosenCards - the card you want merge/select to destroy with you card can be null if playing a card that doesn't target anything

      • processCard

        public void processCard(Card card,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Card> chosenCards)
        Processes any type of give card depending on card characteristics
        Parameters:
        card - the card you want to play
        chosenCards - the card you want merge/select to destroy with you card can be null if playing a card that doesn't target anything
